ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Overcamping the sarnak fort...
ygData.msgSnippet: 30th level ranger can go to Frontier Mountains and solo some of the Giants. Hardest part here is outside you can get flanked in the back by wondering goblins
ygData.messageBody:
30th level ranger can go to Frontier Mountains and
solo some of the Giants. Hardest part here is outside
you can get flanked in the back by wondering goblins
and other mobs like the Burnai.

Another spot you can try is The Overthere. A place
outside you can use snare, root, etc as well as make a
B-Line to the POK book if you get inb trouble.

Keep SOW up at all times

Also if you do Frontier Mountains, Make sure you have
ROOT up , SOW< and know the zone tunnel to DL cause
that it the closest zone area from fort.

Good luck

Rob


--- Chris Talbot <chris@...> wrote:
> Hi, all. My main character is a 30th level ranger on
> the Tarew Marr server,
> and I've soloing the sarnak fort for the last few
> levels (since about
> 24th)...so all in all, probably about a month's
> worth of play time for me.
> For the most part, the fort has been really quiet.
> More often than not, I'm
> the only one fighting there, but over the last few
> days, the sarnak fort has
> become an extremely popular spot for some reason and
> the place is now
> overcamped with groups that end up fighting over the
> sarnaks that spawn
> there.
>
> So I'm trying to figure out where to take my ranger
> next for when I'm
> soloing. When I'm in a group, I have a number of
> places to go, but I can't
> figure out what my next step should be for soloing.
> Would anybody care to
> share some suggestions, please?
>
> Chris
>
>
>
